Title: X-COPS
Plot: A Los Angeles police officer who is being filmed for the show COPS is attacked by a strange monster and Mulder and Scully are investigating the case. Scully is wary of having their faces put on national television but Mulder welcomes the publicity.
GuestStars: Judson Mills, Dee Freeman, Perla Walter, J.W. Smith, Curtis C., Michael Maher, Tara Karsian, Lombardo Boyar, Maria Celedonio, John Michael Vaughn, Daniel Emmett, Frankie Ray, Solomon Eversol, Cheryl Comstock, Ron G
